messages.subject: "Buy a book," she begged.
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, I need Christmas money more than I thought I would. Maybe you need One More Christmas gift to give away, and maybe Thinking Sticks or a copy of Moving a
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, I need Christmas money more than I thought I would.

Maybe you need One More Christmas gift to give away, and maybe
Thinking Sticks or a copy of Moving a Puddle would work. Maybe
there's someone who helped you when your kids were younger, or a
relative with a toddler, or a new unschooling family in your life, or
a support group lending library...

http://sandradodd.com/puddlebook
http://sandradodd.com/tapes
http://sandradodd.com/thinkingsticks

If you use my web site lots and lots and if you would take me to
lunch if I were in your town but you think you'll just send me the
price of a turkey sandwich as a Christmas gift, that would be fun.
My paypal address is my regular address, which is probably also on
all of those pages.


I also love Christmas cards lots, and my address is on one or all of
those pages above.

Thanks,

Sandra
